doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Nimai Chandra Karmakar
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Nimai Chandra Karmakar is a Eye Specialist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS. DO, FCPS (EYE). He is a Professor & Head, Ophthalmology at Rangpur Community Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Nimai Chandra Karmakar at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is 4pm to 8pm (Everyday).
